name: Out of Ctrl (CWL Games)
description:
Submission for the GMTK GameJam 2020. This time I interpreted the topic as literally as possible to create something unique. 

---------------------------------Making of "Out of Ctrl"--------------------------

-> 1 man team

->Design: Affinity Designer on the iPad

->Animation: Callipeg on the iPad

->Music: Garageband on the iPad

->GameEngine: Unity (C#)

-----------------------------------How to Play--------------------------------------

Genre: Endless Runner

Controlls: C or S for crouching  /  space or w for jumping

-------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------

Hope you like it.
